        program main
            implicit none
            integer :: n, i, ok, ng, k, k_ans
            integer, allocatable :: a(:)
            integer, allocatable :: key_stack(:), count_stack(:)
            logical :: isPossible
            character(len=20) :: word
            integer :: uppercase, lowercase, j

            allocate(a(n))
            read(*,*) a

            ! Allocate stack arrays for the function (size n)
            allocate(key_stack(n), count_stack(n))

            ! Binary search

            ok = n
            do while (ok - ng > 1)
                k = (ng+ok)/2
                if (isPossible(k, n, a, key_stack, count_stack)) then
                    ok = k
                else
                    ng = k
                end if
            end do
            k_ans = ok

            ! Now, process the string for the second program

            lowercase = 0
            do j = 1, len_trim(word)
                ch = word(j:j)
                if (ch >= 'A' .and. ch <= 'Z') then
                    uppercase = uppercase + 1
                else if (ch >= 'a' .and. ch <= 'z') then
                    lowercase = lowercase + 1
                end if
            end do

            if (uppercase > lowercase) then
                call to_upper(word)
                print *, trim(word)
            else
                call to_lower(word)
                print *, trim(word)
            end if

        contains

            function isPossible(k, n, a, key_stack, count_stack) result(possible)
                integer, intent(in) :: k, n
                integer, intent(in) :: a(n)
                integer, intent(inout) :: key_stack(n), count_stack(n)
                logical :: possible
                integer :: i, current, p, top

                top = 0
                current = 0
                do i = 1, n
                    if (a(i) <= current) then
                        if (k == 1) then
                            possible = .false.
                            return
                        end if

                        ! Pop keys >= a(i)
                        do while (top > 0)
                            if (key_stack(top) >= a(i)) then
                                top = top - 1
                            else
                                exit
                            end if
                        end do

                        p = a(i) - 1
                        do while (.true.)
                            if (p < 0) then
                                possible = .false.
                                return
                            end if

                            if (top > 0 .and. key_stack(top) == p) then
                                count_stack(top) = count_stack(top) + 1
                            else
                                top = top + 1
                                ! Check if top exceeds n? Should not by the known O(n) bound.
                                key_stack(top) = p
                                count_stack(top) = 1
                            end if

                            if (count_stack(top) == k) then
                                top = top - 1
                                p = p - 1
                            else
                                exit
                            end if
                        end do
                    end if
                    current = a(i)
                end do
                possible = .true.
            end function

            subroutine to_upper(str)
                character(*), intent(inout) :: str
                integer :: i
                do i = 1, len(str)
                    if (str(i:i) >= 'a' .and. str(i:i) <= 'z') then
                        str(i:i) = char(iachar(str(i:i)) - 32)
                    end if
                end do
            end subroutine

            subroutine to_lower(str)
                character(*), intent(inout) :: str
                integer :: i
                do i = 1, len(str)
                    if (str(i:i) >= 'A' .and. str(i:i) <= 'Z') then
                        str(i:i) = char(iachar(str(i:i)) + 32)
                    end if
                end do
            end subroutine

        end program
